description: Read the questions and try to guess the answers.

dialogs.answer: The diet which consists of all the nutrients is called balanced diet.

dialogs.text: What are the types of nutrients that are essential for our body?
dialogs.answer: The type of nutrients that are essential for our body are protein, fats, carbohydrates, minerals, vitamins, and water.

dialogs.text: What do you mean by carbohydrates?
dialogs.answer: That nutrients which gives energy to our body is called carbohydrates.

dialogs.text: What do you mean by minerals?
dialogs.answer: Those nutrients which helps us to build strong bones and teeth is called minerals.

dialogs.text: What do you mean by protein?
dialogs.answer: That nutrients which helps to grow and repair the cells is called protein.

dialogs.text: What do you mean by fats?
dialogs.answer: The nutrients that gives us more energy than carbohydrates is called fats.

dialogs.text: What do you mean by vitamins?
dialogs.answer: The nutrients that protects our body from diseases and keeps us healthy are called vitamins.

dialogs.text: What is the method of preserving iodine in iodized salt?
dialogs.answer: The iodized salt can be preserved by storing it in an enclosed container.

dialogs.text: What do we suffer from due to lack of iodine?
dialogs.answer: We suffer from Goitre due to lack of iodine.

dialogs.text: What are not considered as healthy food?
dialogs.answer: Ready-made foods are not considered as healthy food.

summaryAllDone: Well done! You got all @cards cards correct @max times in a row!

title: Learn about our foods and nutrients
